```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(kableExtra)
library(stringr)
```


```{r}
check <- '<input type="checkbox" checked onclick="return false;">'

uncheck <- '<input type="checkbox" unchecked onclick="return false;">'

build_link <- function(topic, slug, e = parent.frame()) {
  stringr::str_glue('<a href="/post/{slug}">{topic} </a>')
}

render_preview <- function(slug) {
  stringr::str_glue('<a href="/post/{slug}"> <img src="/post/{slug}/thumb.jpg"> </a>')
}
```


## Programming

```{r}
tribble(
  ~` `,            ~Topic,                                ~R,     ~Python,  ~`C++/Rcpp`, ~slug,
   "First Steps" , build_link("Functions", "functions"),   check,  check,     check,      "functions"
  
  ) %>% 
  mutate(`  ` = render_preview(slug)) %>% 
  select(-slug) %>% 
  kable(escape = FALSE, align = "c") %>% 
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("hover", "responsive"), font_size = 16) %>% 
  column_spec(1, bold = TRUE, width = "2cm") %>% 
  column_spec(2:5, width = "4cm") %>%
  column_spec(6, width = "40cm") %>%
  collapse_rows(columns = 1, valign = "top")
```
